suncertify.server
Class ConnectionFactoryImpl

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
        |
        +--java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
              |
              +--java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
                    |
                    +--suncertify.server.ConnectionFactoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectionFactory, java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
public class ConnectionFactoryImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements ConnectionFactory

This class is bound in the rmiregistry in the server-side. Each client-side application startup in the remote mode will get each single connection through of this class. ConnectionFactoryImpl registes rmiregister in the server-side

Version:
1.2 18 Mar 2003
Author:
Francisco Carlos
See Also:
